name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace vs Smoker Battle
keyMoments.description: Ace engages Captain Smoker in combat to cover the Straw Hat Pirates' escape from the Marines in Nanohana.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's protective nature toward Luffy and showcases a clash between two powerful Devil Fruit users.

keyMoments.title: Arm Wrestling with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Ace and Luffy engage in an arm-wrestling contest on a barrel, discovering they are perfectly matched in strength despite Ace being the older brother.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the equal footing and competitive but loving relationship between the brothers.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Geronimo with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Ace grabs Geronimo's sword with his bare hand and superheats it with his fire powers, allowing Luffy to finish him with Gomu Gomu no Bazooka.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Ace and Luffy fighting together as a team in the anime.

keyMoments.title: Hiken Destroys Five Ships
keyMoments.description: Ace demonstrates his signature Hiken (Fire Fist) technique, destroying five Baroque Works Billions ships in one devastating attack.
keyMoments.significance: First full demonstration of Ace's signature technique and why he's called 'Fire Fist Ace'. Establishes his incredible power level.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Blackbeard Hunt
keyMoments.description: Ace explains that he is hunting Blackbeard, a former Whitebeard Pirates member who killed his crewmate Thatch and fled.
keyMoments.significance: Critical foreshadowing for the Summit War saga. Sets up Ace's eventual confrontation with Blackbeard.
keyMoments.quote: I'm tracking down a man named Blackbeard. He was one of us, but he killed a crewmate and ran.

abilities.description: Ace turns his fist into flames and launches it as a massive column of fire capable of destroying multiple ships.

relationships.description: Ace is Luffy's older sworn brother. They share a deep bond and mutual respect.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace and Luffy arm-wrestle and fight together against Baroque Works agents, showing their equal strength and teamwork.

reveals.information: Ace is hunting Blackbeard to avenge the murder of his crewmate Thatch

keyMoments.title: Arm Wrestling with Ace
keyMoments.description: Luffy engages in an arm-wrestling contest with Ace, showing they are equally matched despite Ace being older and more experienced.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth and that he stands on equal footing with his older brother.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Geronimo with Ace
keyMoments.description: After Ace superheats Geronimo's sword, Luffy finishes him with Gomu Gomu no Bazooka.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy and Ace's combat synergy and teamwork.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Join Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: When Ace suggests the Straw Hats join the Whitebeard Pirates, Luffy immediately refuses, stating he wants to compete for the Pirate King title himself.
keyMoments.significance: Reaffirms Luffy's unwavering determination to become Pirate King on his own terms, not as someone's subordinate.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to be King of the Pirates! I won't join anyone else's crew!

relationships.description: Luffy's older sworn brother. They share a competitive but deeply caring relationship.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy and Ace spend quality time together, arm-wrestling and fighting side by side against enemies.

keyMoments.title: Mr. Mellow Debuts
keyMoments.description: Mr. Mellow appears aboard Smoker's ship as a member of the Baroque Works Billions, participating in the execution of Mr. 11.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the few named Billions agents and demonstrates Baroque Works' ruthless approach to security.
keyMoments.quote: We are candidates to be promoted to Officer Agents. We can't let Mr. 11 spill our secrets.

keyMoments.title: Leads Attack on Ace
keyMoments.description: Mr. Mellow leads Geronimo and other Billions in an attempt to capture Fire Fist Ace for promotion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ambition and overconfidence of lower-ranked Baroque Works agents.

reveals.information: Member of Baroque Works Billions seeking promotion to Officer Agent

keyMoments.title: Geronimo Debuts
keyMoments.description: Geronimo appears aboard Smoker's ship as a member of the Baroque Works Billions, participating in the execution of Mr. 11.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a named Billions agent who will later challenge Ace and Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Ace and Luffy
keyMoments.description: Geronimo leads the charge against Ace and Luffy, hoping to capture Fire Fist Ace for promotion to Officer Agent.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ambition of Baroque Works Billions members.
keyMoments.quote: If we take down Fire Fist Ace, we'll surely be promoted to Officer Agents!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Ace and Luffy
keyMoments.description: After attacking Luffy with a sword, Ace grabs and superheats the blade, then Luffy sends Geronimo flying with Gomu Gomu no Bazooka.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power gap between the Billions and powerful pirates like Ace and Luffy.

relationships.description: Fellow Billions member working together to capture Ace

reveals.information: Member of Baroque Works Billions seeking promotion to Officer Agent

keyMoments.title: Mr. 11 Killed by Billions
keyMoments.description: While tied to the mast of Smoker's ship, Mr. 11 is shot and killed by Mr. Mellow and other Billions to prevent him from revealing Baroque Works secrets to the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Baroque Works prioritizes secrecy over the lives of their own agents.

reveals.information: Killed by fellow Baroque Works members to maintain organizational secrecy

keyMoments.title: Smoker vs Ace Battle
keyMoments.description: Smoker engages in combat with Portgas D. Ace while pursuing the Straw Hat Pirates in Nanohana.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates a clash between two Logia-type Devil Fruit users, showcasing the power dynamics between Marine officers and notorious pirates.
